scripts.compile-js: npx google-closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED --env BROWSER --js .cache/replace-classes/app-shell.js --js_output_file .cache/google-closure-compiler/app-shell.js --language_in ECMASCRIPT_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT5 --warning_level VERBOSE --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --property_renaming_report .cache/app-shell.props.json --variable_renaming_report .cache/app-shell.vars.json
scripts.build: npm run mkdirs && npm run favicon && npm run replace-classes && npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run compile-js && npm run inliner && npm run ready
